description: Lilybaeum (modern Marsala) is located at the extreme westernmost point of Sicily. Lilybaeum was a Punic settlement that was conquered by the Romans in 241 B.C.

properties.description: Representative location based on a way derived from OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location of archaeological area
